page.title: 07SERVICES.
page.content: THE{POST OFFICE, GOLDSITHNEY,} COVERS THE AREA AROUND GOLDSITHNEY,ST.HILARY AND ROSUDGEON.TWO POST LADIES ARE EMPLOYED TO DELIVER THE LETTERS AND ONE TO SERVE IN THE OFFICE.THE DELIVERIES WILL BE DONE BY VAN SOON.THERE ARE TWO COLLECTIONS PER DAY FROM FIVE COLLECTION POINTS. THE NEAREST{POLICE STATION}IS AT PENZANCE.THE AREA HAS ITS OWN {COMMUNITY POLICEMAN}WHO MOVES AROUND HIS PRECINCT BY CAR OR MOTOR CYCLE. {FIRE, AMBULANCE AND HOSPITAL {SERVICES}ARE ALL CENTERED ON PENZANCE. A {MOBILE LIBRARY}SERVES THE AREA AND {REFUSE COLLECTION}IS CARRIED OUT BY A PRIVATE CONTRACTOR.
